pages.books: Dive into Diverse Worlds with Source of Wisdom Home Books Events Explore Our Publishing House & Bookstore Welcome to our unique publishing house and bookstore! We are not only publishers of our own books but also offer a wide selection of literature from other publishers. In our assortment, you will find both our original works and books from the world's best publishers. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of literature with us! Our Achievements" Explore the remarkable achievements of our publishing house, where excellence meets innovation. From award-winning publications to bestseller status, our books have earned widespread acclaim for their compelling storytelling and impactful narratives. Join us in celebrating our commitment to quality, creativity, and community engagement as we continue to inspire readers around the world. Bestseller Status Many of our publications have reached bestseller status, both nationally and internationally. Our books have captured the hearts of readers around the globe, resonating with their compelling narratives and engaging characters. Positive Reviews Our publications consistently receive glowing reviews from readers and critics alike. From literary journals to online forums, our books are praised for their thought-provoking themes, captivating plots, and skilled craftsmanship. Community Engagement We actively engage with our readers through book signings, author events, and online discussions. Our commitment to fostering a vibrant literary community has earned us a loyal following and widespread recognition. Diverse Catalog With a diverse catalog spanning various genres and topics, we cater to a wide range of readers' interests and preferences. From fiction to non-fiction, from thrillers to romance, our publications offer something for everyone. Our Publications Our Publications": "Explore a selection of our own publications, ranging from practical guides to captivating novels. Each book is crafted with care and expertise to inspire, educate, and entertain readers of all ages and interests. "The Art of Storytelling" by Sarah Johnson This book is a practical guide to the art of storytelling and creating captivating stories. It offers useful tips, techniques, and examples for writers of all levels. Year of Release: 2020 Order "Exploring the Universe" by David Smith This book takes readers on a fascinating journey through space, telling about the most exciting discoveries and mysteries of the Universe. Illustrated atlas with detailed descriptions of planets, stars, and galaxies. From thrilling mysteries to inspiring memoirs, these books are sure to keep you hooked from beginning to end. The Lost Symbol Follow Robert Langdon as he unravels a mysterious secret hidden within the capital of the United States. A gripping thriller filled with cryptic symbols and hidden meanings. A captivating story of resilience, grace, and strength. Year of Release: 2018 Order Where the Crawdads Sing Set in the marshes of North Carolina, this novel tells the story of Kya Clark, a mysterious woman accused of murder. A haunting tale of love, loss, and the beauty of nature. Year of Release: 2018 Order Bestsellers Explore our bestselling titles that have captivated readers worldwide. From gripping thrillers to powerful memoirs, these books have earned their place at the top of the charts for their compelling storytelling and unforgettable characters. The Silent Patient This psychological thriller follows the story of Alicia Berenson, a woman who murders her husband and then stops speaking. Gripping and suspenseful, with twists and turns that will keep you guessing until the very end. Year of Release: 2019 Order Educated A memoir of resilience and self-discovery, Tara Westover recounts her journey from a survivalist family in Idaho to earning a PhD from Cambridge University. A powerful story of overcoming adversity and the pursuit of education. Year of Release: 2018 Order Circe In this retelling of Greek mythology, Circe, the daughter of the sun god Helios, tells her own story. A captivating exploration of power, love, and self-discovery that breathes new life into ancient tales. Year of Release: 2018 Order New Releases Stay up-to-date with the latest releases from our publishing house and other top publishers. From captivating fiction to groundbreaking non-fiction, these newly published books are sure to intrigue and inspire readers of all tastes. The Midnight Library Enter the Midnight Library, where every book represents a different life that could have been. Follow Nora Seed as she explores these alternate realities in search of the life she truly wants. A heartwarming and thought-provoking journey of self-discovery. Year of Release: 2020 Order Project Hail Mary When a lone astronaut wakes up in deep space with no memory of who he is or how he got there, he must race against time to save humanity from extinction. A gripping and scientifically accurate thriller from the author of "The Martian." Year of Release: 2021 Order The Push In this chilling psychological thriller, a mother begins to question her own sanity as she struggles to bond with her daughter. A haunting exploration of motherhood, trauma, and the dark secrets that lie beneath the surface. Year of Release: 2021 Order Other Publishers Discover a curated selection of books from other esteemed publishers. From award-winning novels to timeless classics, these titles offer something for every reader's tastes and interests. The Song of Achilles This retelling of the Trojan War through the eyes of Patroclus, companion to the legendary Achilles, offers a fresh perspective on one of the greatest stories of ancient Greece. A beautifully written and deeply moving tale of love and sacrifice. Year of Release: 2011 Order Normal People Follow the complex relationship between Connell and Marianne as they navigate love, friendship, and identity through their teenage years and into adulthood. Scott Fitzgerald Order Show more About Us "Source of Wisdom" was founded in 2010 by two bibliophiles, John Smith and Emma Johnson. They decided to combine their passion for reading and love for literature to create a space where people could exchange books, ideas, and inspiration. Over time, the company grew from a modest bookshop into a large network, uniting book clubs, literary events, and online resources for reading enthusiasts. Today, "Source of Wisdom" is a leading player in the literary services market, striving to promote reading and cultural development through books and communication. Values and Principles Main values and principles followed by the company "Source of Wisdom" Commitment to quality We adhere to high quality standards, providing our customers with only the best books and literary services that inspire and enrich. Community and communication We value interaction and communication among people through books. We create a space for exchanging ideas, discussing works, and mutual inspiration. Diversity and inclusion We recognize and appreciate the diversity of literary genres, authors, and opinions. We strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcomed and understood. Education and self-development We support educational initiatives that contribute to the development of reading skills, analytical thinking, and critical perception of literature. Innovation and development We are constantly seeking new ways to inspire and amaze our customers. We are open to innovation and strive for continuous development to remain a leader in the world of literary culture. Join Us! 100 Over 100 successful literary events held annually. 500 More than 500 people participating in our book clubs every month. 5000 Offering a diverse catalog of over 5000 books across various genres and topics. 1000 Over 1000 satisfied customers who have ordered books Feel free to join our events or request a book through the "Contact Us" form. Contact Us Our Goals and Plans Company Goals: Expand the network of book clubs and organize new literary events to attract a larger audience of readers. Develop an online platform for book sales and virtual literary meetings. Diversify the range of books based on the preferences and feedback of our customers. Implement educational programs and initiatives to promote reading among children and youth. Strengthen partnerships with publishers and authors to expand the assortment and improve the quality of the offered literature. Plans for the Future: Launch a literary education program and reading skills development for a wide audience. Create a virtual platform for book exchange and literature discussions among community members. Organize large-scale literary festivals and conferences to raise awareness of the book culture. Develop a corporate reading program for companies and organizations, promoting corporate culture and employee education. Launch a literary scholarships and grants program to support aspiring writers and talented students. California Residents Privacy Rights California residents have certain rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).
